name: Ribbon
description:
A ribbon/banner inspired invitation that is fresh, fun and classic

I love a good party and believe it should have an equally lovely invitation. Our semi-custom invitations are designed so that you can tailor these invitations to your color theme and style.

Customization:
When you are ready to customize this invitation, review our font list and color options and provide that information with your invitation details in the order comments section. If you would like to see more font styles or have a different color combinations in mind just email me and I'll be happy to work with you to tailor this invite to your specifications.

A few more details:
Invitations are priced per item (invitation+envelope). Minimum order quantity is 20. The Ribbon invitation is 5x7 in size and is digitally printed on a 100lb card stock.

name: Chevron
description:
I love patterns and these simple, chic invitations add a little pattern to your celebration. While we have come up with our own color combinations if you have one you'd like to see let us know.

I love a good party and believe it should have an equally lovely invitation so when I dreamed up these fill-in the blank invitations I wanted to make sure they were stylish, functional and fun. Whether you're planning a party weeks in advance or in a matter of days, these fill-in invitations are perfect for your next celebration.

A few more details.
Our 5x7 invitations are sold with envelopes and in a set of 10. These invitations are digitally printed on a 80lb card stock and packaged in a clear cello bag. When you place your order, please specify your desired color combination from the options section.

name: Lily

name: Violet
description:
Classic, elegant and full of tradition.  We add our own twist by adding a little color to the names of the honored guest.  This invitation is perfect for engagement parties, anniversaries and rehearsal dinners. 

I love a good party and believe it should have an equally lovely invitation. Our semi-custom invitations are designed so that you can tailor these invitations to your color theme and style.

Customization:

A few more details:
